This thing could be used on the largest of trucks.)* Multiple useful attachments (Although I do wish they had a narrow suction attachment for real hard to reach places.)* Suction power (For the size, the power is great. Comparable to a well-charged modern Dustbuster.)* Overall mechanical quality (The vacuum sounds smooth and mechanically well built. Not like the other vacuums I've tried that sounded like nuts and bolts in a blender. I would assume this thing has a well constructed brushed DC motor.)CONS:* Cheap plastic chemical smell (Although the build quality is sturdy, the plastic smells cheap)* Accessory quality (The clear extension tube is made of a polycarbonate type of plastic which can crack easily if you're not careful.)* Portable carrying bag just a tad too small (While I wouldn't consider this a con myself, I find that the carrying bag is just a tad too small to fit everything comfortably.)Overall, 4 out of 5 stars. Perfect for general purpose cleaning and I highly recommend this to those who want to keep their car clean.

author: David
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2020
review_content: I bought this corded hand held vac to help me keep the inside of my truck clean.  When doing my due diligence I read the reviews of other owners of this vacuum. author: Dwayne Daniels
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2019
review_content: Like every other product out there, I have to look at it on how well it did the job for the price I paid for it. author: AJDestin
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2019
review_content: I live near a beach and thus will always have sand in my car. While this little vacuum isn’t perfect, it does the job just about as well as the big vacuums at the local car washes. It would be nice if it had a little more suction, but it does the job adequately. The cord is really long, and you can easily plug it into any outlet in your car and vacuum anywhere inside unless you happen to drive some giant stretched limo. The little hose and nozzle attachment is really good for getting into tight spots and it seems to work the best for sand. Overall, this is a good little vacuum for your car. It is a little loud, though, and the plug and cord will get a little hot.
title: Nice little vacuum
